main_definition: MPG stands for miles per gallon, a unit of measurement used to express the fuel efficiency of vehicles.

meanings_and_examples.example: The car gets 30 mpg on the highway.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Comparison between fuel efficiency of different vehicles or models
meanings_and_examples.example: This hybrid model has a higher MPG rating than that sedan, making it more fuel-efficient.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Standard Unit for Fuel Efficiency in the United States
meanings_and_examples.example: When comparing cars, always check their mpg ratings to determine which one is more environmentally friendly and cost-effective over time.
